title: can we get rewarded for remakes
body:
I'm getting annoyed with all these remakes and queue dodges
can we please get at least something because they wasted 10 minutes of our time

replies.body: It’s like winning without actually doing anything. I disagree with this.

but typically the person that dcd takes forever in the loading screen and then you realise you've wasted a ton of your life staring at a loading screen
you don't do anything, but it's not your fault that the person dc'd
edit: i changed the do to dont
